RadioGroupRoot.name: RadioGroupRoot
RadioGroupRoot.docstring: A set of interactive radio buttons where only one can be selected at a time.

properties.name: high_contrast
properties.description: Whether to render the radio group with higher contrast color against background

properties.name: value
properties.description: The controlled value of the radio item to check. Should be used in conjunction with on_change.

properties.name: default_value
properties.description: The initial value of checked radio item. Should be used in conjunction with on_change.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Whether the radio group is disabled

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the group. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Whether the radio group is required

styling_props.name: size
styling_props.description: The size of the radio group: "1" | "2" | "3"

styling_props.name: variant
styling_props.description: The variant of the radio group

styling_props.name: color_scheme
styling_props.description: The color of the radio group

RadioGroupItem.name: RadioGroupItem
RadioGroupItem.docstring: An item in the group that can be checked.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of the radio item to check. Should be used in conjunction with on_change.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the radio item.

properties.name: required
properties.description: When true, indicates that the user must check the radio item before the owning form can be submitted.

HighLevelRadioGroup.name: HighLevelRadioGroup
HighLevelRadioGroup.docstring: High level wrapper for the RadioGroup component.

properties.name: items
properties.description: The items of the radio group.

properties.name: direction
properties.description: The direction of the radio group.

properties.name: spacing
properties.description: The gap between the items of the radio group.

properties.name: high_contrast
properties.description: Whether to render the radio group with higher contrast color against background

properties.name: value
properties.description: The controlled value of the radio item to check. Should be used in conjunction with on_change.

properties.name: default_value
properties.description: The initial value of checked radio item. Should be used in conjunction with on_change.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Whether the radio group is disabled

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the group. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Whether the radio group is required

styling_props.name: size
styling_props.description: The size of the radio group.

styling_props.name: variant
styling_props.description: The variant of the radio group

styling_props.name: color_scheme
styling_props.description: The color of the radio group
